data.lyric:
[ti:Homicide]
[ar:Logic/Eminem]
[al:Homicide]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Homicide (Explicit) - Logic/Eminem (埃米纳姆)
[00:00.51]Lyrics by：Sir Robert Bryson Hall II/Marshall Mathers/Jeremy Alexander Uribe/Dillan Beau Bailard/Donnell Stephens III/Tim Schoegje/Luis Resto
[00:01.03]Composed by：Sir Robert Bryson Hall II/Marshall Mathers/Jeremy Alexander Uribe/Dillan Beau Bailard/Donnell Stephens III/Tim Schoegje/Luis Resto
[00:01.55]Smokey Legendary/Logic：
[00:03.36]Son you know why you the greatest alive
[00:07.15]Why Dad
[00:08.62]Because you came out of my balls n***a
[00:11.74]Hahahahahaha
[00:13.52]Logic：
[00:14.07]F**k rap
[00:14.46]Bustin' like an addict with a semi-automatic
[00:15.95]Who done had it and he ready for anybody to buck back
[00:17.84]Hold up catch a vibe ain't no way in hell we leavin' nobody alive
[00:20.04]Leave a suicide note f**k that
[00:21.27]Bobby feelin' villainous he killin' this
[00:22.52]I'm comin' for your man and his lady and even the baby
[00:24.65]I'm feelin' like I'm chika-chika-chika Slim Shady with rabies
[00:26.57]Logic：
[00:26.77]I'm foamin' out the mouth ain't nobody takin' me out
[00:28.45]Every single rapper in the industry yeah they know what I'm about
[00:30.46]And I dare you to test me
[00:31.50]'Cause not a single one of you motherf**kers impress me
[00:33.07]And maybe that's a little bit of an exaggeration
[00:34.71]But I'm full of innovation
[00:35.52]And I'm tired of all of this high school "he's cool he's not" rap s**t
[00:39.12]Can a single one of you motherf**kers even rap s**t
[00:41.44]No this ain't a diss to the game it's a gas to the flame
[00:43.58]Nowadays everybody sound the same s**t's lame
[00:45.21]Like a moth to the flame I'm a realer man a killer
[00:47.01]Know you feelin' it I sizzle when I'm spillin' it I'm feelin' myself
[00:49.04]Yeah yeah Bobby Boy he be feelin' himself
[00:50.65]Mass murder like this can't be good for my health
[00:52.41]When I rap like this do I sound like s**t
[00:54.05]Well it don't really matter 'cause I'm killin' this s**t
[00:55.78]Yeah I'm killin' this s**t
[00:56.65]Oh yeah oh yeah I'm killin' this s**t
[00:58.42]Bobby how many times you been killin' this s**t
[01:00.34]Find another rhyme godd**n n***a s**t
[01:01.73]Logic：
[01:02.07]F**k rap
[01:02.45]Bustin' like an addict with a semi-automatic
[01:03.77]Who done had it and he ready for anybody to buck back
[01:05.81]Hold up catch a vibe ain't no way in hell we leavin' nobody alive
[01:08.02]Leave a suicide note f**k that
[01:09.23]Bobby feelin' villainous he killin' this
[01:10.66]I'm comin' for your man and his lady and even the baby
[01:12.65]I'm feelin' like I'm chika-chika-chika-chika
[01:14.03]Chika-chika-chika-chika-chika Slim Shady
[01:15.52]Logic：
[01:15.68]There's nowhere to hide we call this s**t genocide
[01:17.77]Hit 'em with that
[01:18.44]Do-do-do
[01:18.85]And they die
[01:19.44]We gon' leave 'em crucified we call this s**t genocide
[01:22.12]I got b***he's I got h*es I got rare designer clothes
[01:25.62]No we ain't f**kin' with that
[01:26.75]Yeah there's a time and a place
[01:27.90]But if you ain't comin' with the illest of raps
[01:29.81]Callin' yourself the greatest alive
[01:31.33]Then you don't deserve to do that
[01:32.72]No no oh no no please do not do that
[01:34.50]You gon' get smacked
[01:35.38]You gon' make Bobby attack
[01:36.72]You gon' make Bobby Boy snap
[01:38.02]You gon' make Bobby Boy snap
[01:39.26]Bobby Boy
[01:39.64]Logic：
[01:39.85]F**k rap
[01:40.23]Bustin' like an addict with a semi-automatic
[01:41.60]Who done had it and he ready for anybody to buck back
[01:43.58]Hold up catch a vibe ain't no way in hell we leavin' nobody alive
[01:45.74]Leave a suicide note f**k that
[01:47.05]Bobby feelin' villainous he killin' this
[01:48.30]I'm comin' for your man and his lady and even the baby
[01:50.29]I'm feelin' like I'm chika-chika-chika-chika
[01:51.61]Chika-chika-chika-chika-chika Slim Shady
[01:53.24]Eminem：
[01:53.43]Jigga-jigga-jigga-jigga-jigga like JAY-Z
[01:55.09]Jig is up you f**kers who didn't write anything
[01:56.72]Are getting washed now chika-chika-chika like bathing
[01:58.59]Young Hova I know hittas like Yankees
[02:00.28]Gun toters that pull triggers like crazy
[02:01.97]Unloadin' leave you shot up in your Rover
[02:03.59]Your body goes limp and slumps over
[02:05.14]Like A-Rod in a month lull but he just homered
[02:07.84]Hol' up I said rover because now your Rover is red
[02:10.53]Like Red Rover so you know what I meant
[02:12.06]But I rode over my opponents instead
[02:13.75]Makin' dog sounds 'cause I gotta keep breakin' these bars down
[02:16.27]I'll go slow for the speds
[02:17.24]But when I go
[02:17.94]Roof
[02:18.14]Like the doberman said
[02:19.00]I still think the
[02:19.69]Roof
[02:19.69]Would go over your head
[02:20.65]Haha
[02:20.74]Beast mode motherf**kers 'bout to get hit
[02:22.20]With so many foul lines you think I'm a free throw
[02:23.99]Figured it was about time for people to eat crow
[02:25.52]You about to get out-rhymed how could I be dethroned
[02:27.24]I stay on my toes like the repo a behemoth in sheep clothes
[02:29.59]From the East Coast to the West I'm the ethos and I'm the G.O.A.T
[02:32.17]Who the best I don't gotta say a f**kin' thing though
[02:33.74]'Cause MCs know
[02:34.48]But you don't wanna hear me spit the facts
[02:35.88]Your s**t is a*s like a tail bone
[02:37.15]And you're trapped in your cell phone
[02:38.20]I'ma chicken scratch I'ma self-loathe
[02:39.28]I don't want to f**kin' listen to you spit your rap someone else wrote
[02:41.67]Used to get beat up by the big kids
[02:43.12]Used to let the big kids steal my big wheel
[02:44.61]And I wouldn't do s**t but just sit still
[02:46.23]Now money's not a big deal
[02:47.40]I'm rich I wipe my a*s with six mill'
[02:49.38]Big bills like a platypus
[02:50.28]A caterpillar's comin' to get the cannabis
[02:51.58]I'm lookin' for the smoke 'cause you motherf**kers are scatterin'
[02:53.40]Batterin' everything and I've had it with the inadequate
[02:55.02]Man I can see my d**k is standin' stiff as a mannequin
[02:56.89]And I'm bringin' the bandana back and the f**kin' headband again
[02:58.47]A handkerchief and I'm thinkin' of bringin' the f**kin' fingerless gloves back
[03:00.69]And not giving a singular f**k like f**k rap
[03:02.26]I sound like a f**kin' millionaire
[03:03.45]With the Derringer with a hair trigger
[03:04.76]'Bout to bear hug your f**kin' terrier to "Ric Flair Drip"
[03:06.48]And y'all couldn't hold a candle at a prayer vigil
[03:08.41]When I vent they compare me to a f**kin' air duct
[03:10.07]I'm about to bare knuckle it nah f**k it
[03:11.34]I'm gonna go upside the head with a Nantucket
[03:12.78]Abraca-f**kin'-dabra
[03:13.88]The track is the blood I'm attracted I'm attackin' it
[03:15.96]What Dracula f**k that s**t
[03:17.08]I'm up back with a thud-
[03:18.34]Man stop
[03:19.15]Chris D'Elia：
[03:19.94]Look what I'm plannin' plannin' I'm plannin' to
[03:22.53]Do all this while ya panickin'
[03:24.61]And you're lookin' and starin' at mannequins
[03:26.51]And I'm goin' to Fanagans
[03:28.39]Trying to get up a plan against
[03:30.42]All of the blana-kazana-ka-fam-bam-bannigans
[03:33.28]While of all the bana-kazanika Hanna in a cabana
[03:36.04]You're in a cab-
[03:36.76]I'm in a cabana and a Janet
[03:38.89]I'm in a cabana chantin' all this stand up banter
[03:41.41]While you don't got the stamina you're lackin' the stamina
[03:44.17]You're lackin' the stamina while you're divorcin' Harrison Ford
[03:46.60]And I'm in a Porsche on the floor boards
[03:48.87]While I'm world tourin'
[03:51.50]You usin' way too many napkins papkins
[03:54.78]Lapkins and chapki-
[03:56.12]You using ChapStick and napkins while I'm bapkin'
[03:59.26]Flappin' around like a bapkin'
[04:02.23]Flamminababbitapannitajampkin
[04:03.80]Dammit a can of p-
data.trans:
[ti:Homicide]
[ar:Logic/Eminem]
[al:Homicide]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.51]//
[00:01.03]//
[00:01.55]//
[00:03.36]儿子 你知道为什么你会取得这样大的成就吗
[00:07.15]为什么 爸爸
[00:08.62]因为你是我生的啊
[00:11.74]哈哈哈哈
[00:13.52]//
[00:14.07]去他的说唱
[00:14.46]速度就像着魔的人拿着半自动的枪扫射
[00:15.95]已经受够了 他准备好正面迎击别人的挑战了
[00:17.84]等一等 有一种感觉 我们绝不会让任何人活着
[00:20.04]自杀遗言 去他的
[00:21.27]Bobby心中充满恶念 他要开始屠杀
[00:22.52]我的目标是你的男人 还有他的女人 连孩子都不放过
[00:24.65]我感觉自己就像得了狂犬病的Slim Shady
[00:26.57]//
[00:26.77]我口沫横飞 谁都不能阻挡我
[00:28.45]行业里的每个说唱歌手都知道我的能耐
[00:30.46]我打赌 你们不敢考验我
[00:31.50]因为我看不起你们之中任何一个人
[00:33.07]或许有点夸张
[00:34.71]但我真的是才华横溢
[00:35.52]我听烦了那些水平低得只知道说谁酷谁不酷的垃圾说唱
[00:39.12]你们中到底有没有真正能唱说唱的人
[00:41.44]不 我没有diss这个行业 我只是希望这个行业越来越好
[00:43.58]如今 大家的音乐听起来都一个样 真是难听死了
[00:45.21]就像飞蛾扑火 我是真正的男子汉 是个冷酷无情的杀手
[00:47.01]我知道你明白 我说唱的时候滋滋作响 我的状态特别好
[00:49.04]Bobby Boy 他的状态特别好
[00:50.65]这种大屠杀一般的说唱对我身体不太好
[00:52.41]我这样的说唱 很难听吗
[00:54.05]无所谓 因为我就是要这样
[00:55.78]我就是要这样
[00:56.65]我就是要这样
[00:58.42]Bobby 你已经重复了多少次
[01:00.34]换个韵脚吧 我的天哪 兄弟
[01:01.73]//
[01:02.07]去他的说唱
[01:02.45]速度就像着魔的人拿着半自动的枪扫射
[01:03.77]已经受够了 他准备好正面迎击别人的挑战了
[01:05.81]等一等 有一种感觉 我们绝不会让任何人活着
[01:08.02]自杀遗言 去他的
[01:09.23]Bobby心中充满恶念 他要开始屠杀
[01:10.66]我的目标是你的男人 还有他的女人 连孩子都不放过
[01:12.65]我感觉自己就像
[01:14.03]Slim Shady
[01:15.52]//
[01:15.68]无处可藏 我们把这称作种族屠杀
[01:17.77]用机枪一样的说唱
[01:18.44]攻击他们
[01:18.85]无一生还
[01:19.44]我们要把他们折磨至死 我们把这称作种族屠杀
[01:22.12]我有很多女人 我还有很多稀有的名牌服装
[01:25.62]不 我们不唱这样的玩意儿
[01:26.75]的确 我也曾这样做过
[01:27.90]但如果你不做出有真正厉害的说唱歌曲
[01:29.81]把自己打造成世上最厉害的人
[01:31.33]那你就没资格唱这些有的没的
[01:32.72]不要这样 千万不要这样唱
[01:34.50]你会被教训的
[01:35.38]你会让Bobby忍不住打人
[01:36.72]你会让Bobby Boy发脾气的
[01:38.02]你会让Bobby Boy发脾气的
[01:39.26]//
[01:39.64]//
[01:39.85]去他的说唱
[01:40.23]速度就像着魔的人拿着半自动的枪扫射
[01:41.60]已经受够了 他准备好正面迎击别人的挑战了
[01:43.58]等一等 有一种感觉 我们绝不会让任何人活着
[01:45.74]自杀遗言 去他的
[01:47.05]Bobby心中充满恶念 他要开始屠杀
[01:48.30]我的目标是你的男人 还有他的女人 连孩子都不放过
[01:50.29]我感觉自己就像
[01:51.61]Slim Shady
[01:53.24]//
[01:53.43]像Jay-Z这样的人
[01:55.09]枪手上场 你们从来没有真正写过歌
[01:56.72]你们现在想要把自己洗白吗
[01:58.59]年轻的Hova 我认识Yankee一样厉害的击球手
[02:00.28]随身带枪的人疯了一样扣扳机
[02:01.97]疯狂射击 把坐在路虎揽胜里的你打成筛子
[02:03.59]你的身体靠在椅子上 软塌塌 毫无生气
[02:05.14]就像休息期的Alex Rodriguez 但他能够轻松获得全垒打
[02:07.84]等一下 我说揽胜是因为你的揽胜现在被鲜血染红了
[02:10.53]就像Red Rover游戏一样 这样你就明白我的意思了吧
[02:12.06]但我选择直接进攻对手
[02:13.75]制造狗叫声 因为我要让把这些歌词解释清楚
[02:16.27]我会唱慢一点 让所有人都听懂我的歌
[02:17.24]但当我开始唱
[02:17.94]的时候
[02:18.14]就像杜宾犬的叫声一样
[02:19.00]我依然觉得
[02:19.69]你们
[02:19.69]听不懂我的歌
[02:20.65]哈哈
[02:20.74]开启野兽模式 有些家伙要遭殃了
[02:22.20]超强的歌词 谁都挡不住 你还以为我在投任意球
[02:23.99]看来有些人是时候低头认错了
[02:25.52]你都要输了 我怎么可能失去王位
[02:27.24]我全靠自己走到今天 就像披着羊皮的巨兽
[02:29.59]从东海岸到西海岸 我就是潮流 我就是史上最强的人
[02:32.17]谁是最强的 不需要我多说
[02:33.74]因为是个MC都知道
[02:34.48]但你不想听我说出事实
[02:35.88]你的那些歌都像尾骨一样无足轻重
[02:37.15]你整天埋在手机里
[02:38.20]我张牙舞爪的字迹 我自我厌恶的样子
[02:39.28]我不想听你唱别人写的歌
[02:41.67]以前经常被大孩子欺负
[02:43.12]小单车也被大孩子偷掉
[02:44.61]我无能为力 只能干坐着
[02:46.23]现在钞票已经不是问题
[02:47.40]我有钱了 用六百万纸币擦屁股
[02:49.38]大大的钞票就像鸭嘴兽的嘴
[02:50.28]开着履带车去拉货
[02:51.58]我想要跟你们玩一玩 但你们都躲着不敢出来
[02:53.40]抨击一切 我受够了那些没实力还装大佬的人
[02:55.02]朋友 我感觉我那地方硬得就像服装店里的假人模特
[02:56.89]我要重新带上头巾和头带
[02:58.47]再加一条手帕 还有无指手套 统统戴上
[03:00.69]根本不在乎 去他的说唱
[03:02.26]我听起来就像个百万富翁
[03:03.45]随身带着微力扳机的短筒手枪
[03:04.76]使出熊抱之力 干掉那些小杂碎 我就像Ric Flair一样无人可挡
[03:06.48]你们这些人在祈祷会上连根蜡烛都拿不稳
[03:08.41]当我发泄心中不满的时候 他们把我比作通风管道
[03:10.07]我要赤手空拳跟他们干 去他的
[03:11.34]我要让他们头晕目眩 找不到方向
[03:12.78]阿布拉卡达布拉
[03:13.88]音乐就是鲜血 我为之深深着迷 我要发起进攻
[03:15.96]什么 德古拉伯爵 去他的
[03:17.08]我来了 重磅回归
[03:18.34]朋友 停下来
[03:19.15]//
[03:19.94]听着 我正准备做大事
[03:22.53]而你们还在惶恐不安
[03:24.61]你们盯着商店的橱窗蠢蠢欲动 犹豫不决
[03:26.51]我要去Fanagans了
[03:28.39]想要找个办法对付
[03:30.42]那些可恶的家伙
[03:33.28]当别人在海边小屋享受的时候
[03:36.04]你还坐在出租车里
[03:36.76]我在海边小屋晒太阳 身边还有漂亮的姑娘
[03:38.89]我在海边小屋跟人闹着玩 开心得不得了
[03:41.41]而你们没什么耐力 你们缺乏耐力
[03:44.17]你就像Harrison Ford离婚的时候 经不住考验
[03:46.60]我开着保时捷
[03:48.87]我环游世界
[03:51.50]你用了太多纸巾
[03:54.78]太多餐巾纸
[03:56.12]我在外面享受的时候你还在拿着筷子和纸巾发愁
[03:59.26]忧心忡忡 不知所措
[04:02.23]心中乱成一团糟
[04:03.80]可恶啊 就像一罐啥玩意儿
